title: The Atmosphere Of The Novel Is In Crisis
alternative_title: 빙의한 소설의 분위기가 위기; ; The atmosphere of the novel is in crisis
status: 빙의한 소설의 분위기가 위기; ; The atmosphere of the novel is in crisis
description:
Description :
        Cain (top) is obsessed with misanthropy. A twisted hero who doesn't like the world even after being saved by Satin. He thinks that all other humans should die except for Satin.Satin (bottom), a petit bourgeois who wants to be a good person. He thinks that children and the elderly should be protected. However, he also thinks that one should know where to include and where not to include, so he doesn't act recklessly. "When you are in the pitch-black darkness, someone might find you and save you. For no reason at all."+
